description:
A fine-fitting PFD for women who tour by kayak or canoe. Articulated, full-range flexing princess seams provide an anatomical fit and comfort. Vertical front entry zipper with contoured foam.

  • 2 duplex stretch mesh pockets, with zipper closures and a key lanyard
  • Electronics pocket
  • Thermomoulded adjustable shoulder straps
  • Front lash tab with cover to keep knife end out of the way and prevent snagging
  • Strobe lash tab on back
  • Solas reflective strips on front and back
  • Chest circumference: Small fits 86–96cm (34–38in.). Medium fits 96cm–106cm (38–42in.). Large fits 106–116cm (42–46in.). Extra large fits 114–124cm (45–49in.)
name: Kokatat MsFit Tour PFD - Women's
